TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE – a locality in LOC of LOC . The respondent Government were represented by PERSON , Representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant is a school teacher . In DATE she was dismissed from work . She brought proceedings against her employer – a municipal school owned and funded by the local authority – for reinstatement , pecuniary and non - pecuniary damages .

On CARDINAL DATE the ORG of LOC found for the applicant . The court ordered the applicant ’s reinstatement and awarded her MONEY ( RUR ) in pecuniary damage , RUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL in non - pecuniary damage and ORG in costs and expenses .
On DATE ORG upheld the judgment on appeal .
On DATE the applicant was again dismissed from work and once again brought proceedings seeking to be reinstated and awarded non - pecuniary damage .
On DATE the ORG of LOC dismissed the applicant ’s claims .
However , on DATE ORG upheld the judgment on appeal .

It appears that the judgment of DATE , as upheld on DATE , was enforced in so far as pecuniary damage was concerned , whereas the award of RUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL for non - pecuniary damage as well as of ORG awarded for costs and expenses remained unenforced .
On an unspecified date the applicant applied for indexation of the remaining judgment debt .

On DATE the ORG of LOC acknowledged that the judgment of CARDINAL DATE as upheld on appeal on DATE remained partially unenforced and awarded the applicant RUR CARDINAL . The awarded sum represented the sum of the remaining principal debt ( RUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL ) and the damages for inflation losses ( RUR CARDINAL ) .
On DATE the enforcement proceedings were set in motion .
On DATE RUR CARDINAL were transferred on the applicant ’s bank account .
